story.iWant: I want every enrichment run, rule sync, persona copy, annotation, or export logged
story.tasks: - [ ] Table + helper (AC: 1) - [ ] Update init script to create `activity_log`. - [ ] Add `backend/services/logging.log_activity`. - [ ] Wire actions (AC: 2–3) - [ ] Update CLIs and UI components to call logger. - [ ] Include helpful `details` payloads (counts, rule IDs, etc.). - [ ] Viewing/export (AC: 4) - [ ] Admin tab or CLI command to filter/export logs. - [ ] Documentation (AC: 5) - [ ] README section for audit logging.

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Introduce an `activity_log` DuckDB table with columns: `id`, `timestamp`, `role`, `user_identifier` (optional), `action` (enum), `target` (domain/rule/feature), `details` (JSON). 2. Every key action (enrichment CLI, rule sync CLI, persona copy, snippet copy, annotation add/edit/delete, adapter changes, board brief export) calls `log_activity(...)`. 3. Failure events (RBAC denials, CLI errors) are also logged with status `failed`. 4. CLI or Streamlit admin page can export/view logs (CSV/Parquet) with filters. 5. README documents how logging works and where data lives.
